# polytomic_bigquery_connection (Data Source)

Big Query Connection

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "polytomic_bigquery_connection" "bigquery" {
  organization = polytomic_organization.acme.id
  id           = "aab123aa-27f3-abc1-9999-abcde123a4aa"
}
```
